entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm except locally 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 09 February 2023
